text: "Break My Heart" is a 2020 song by English singer-songwriter Dua Lipa. The genre can be described as a pop song. The song samples the song Need You Tonight by rock band INXS. It is one of Lipas hughest charting songs. Iit charted at number 13 on the Billboard Hot 100. The song is on her second studio album Future Nostalgia. Category:2020 songs Category:Dua Lipa songs
title: Break My Heart (Dua Lipa song)
